name: Tuna Allergy Management
content: Make sure to avoid tuna completely in Robin's diet. Inform all caregivers, read food labels diligently, and monitor for any reactions.

name: Vegetarian Diet Planning
content: Create a balanced vegetarian meal plan for Robin, ensuring she gets all necessary nutrients for growth and development.

name: Encouraging Gross Motor Skills
content: Incorporate activities like crawling, standing, and walking with assistance to help Robin improve gross motor skills.

name: Pending Immunizations
content: Schedule appointments for Robin's pending immunizations to ensure she's fully up-to-date.

name: Nanny/Babysitter Briefing
content: Update the nanny or babysitter on Robin's latest care plan, dietary needs, and allergy precautions.

name: Post-Mealtime Walks
content: Take short, gentle walks around the neighborhood to help Robin's digestion and encourage physical activity.

name: Daily Reading Sessions
content: Spend 15-20 minutes reading age-appropriate books to Robin to enhance language and cognitive skills.

name: Nutritional Supplements
content: Discuss the need for any nutritional supplements with your pediatrician to support Robin's vegetarian diet.

name: Vaccination Reminder
content: Keep track of Robinâ€™s vaccination schedule and make timely appointments for upcoming shots.

name: Sensory Play Fun
content: Engage Robin in sensory play activities like playing with textured toys or exploring safe household items to bolster sensory development.

name: Regular Check-Ups
content: Schedule regular check-ups with Dr. Fun to monitor Robin's growth and address any health concerns promptly.

name: New Immunizations
content: Ensure Robin receives any new immunizations required for her age bracket.

name: Family Activities
content: Plan fun family activities that promote movement and interaction, like a trip to the park or backyard playtime.

name: Hydration Check
content: Ensure Robin stays hydrated, especially during sunny weather. Aim for frequent sips of water throughout the day.

name: Outdoor Playtime
content: Encourage outdoor playtime in safe, supervised areas to further boost Robin's gross motor skills and social interaction.

name: Healthy Snacks
content: Prepare a variety of healthy, vegetarian snacks for Robin, balancing taste and nutrition.

name: Allergy Awareness
content: Teach Robin to understand her allergy in an age-appropriate way, so she can start recognizing safe and unsafe foods.

name: New Activity Introduction
content: Introduce a new stimulating activity each week, like building blocks or musical toys, to enhance cognitive skills.

name: Tracking Development
content: Keep a journal of Robin's progress in her gross motor skills to discuss during the next pediatric visit.

name: Playdate Planning
content: Plan playdates with other children to encourage social interaction and friendship building.

name: Dental Care Routine
content: Establish a gentle dental care routine, including brushing with baby-safe toothpaste and using soft-bristle brushes.

name: New Milestone Goals
content: Set new developmental milestone goals for Robin, like unsupported walking or simple words.

name: Structured Play
content: Incorporate structured playtime with specific toys and activities to promote fine and gross motor skill development.

name: Sleep Routine Check
content: Review and optimize Robin's sleep routine to ensure she gets adequate rest for her growth and development.

name: Language Games
content: Play language-based games to support Robin's speech and cognitive development.

name: Hydration Check-in
content: Make sure Robin stays well-hydrated, especially during the warm months.

name: Activity Diversity
content: Introduce new and diverse activities to Robin's playtime to stimulate various developmental areas.

name: Monitoring Dietary Intake
content: Keep track of Robin's daily dietary intake to ensure she's receiving balanced nutrition.

name: Summer Health Tips
content: Follow summer health tips to keep Robin cool and healthy, like wearing breathable clothing and having plenty of fluids.

name: Check on Physical Milestones
content: Track progress on Robin's physical milestones and encourage her with supportive activities.

name: Interactive Story Time
content: Engage in interactive story time by using different voices and encouraging Robin to point out characters.

name: Participate in a Hackathon
content: Thanks Nikhil and Danielle for a dope AI hackathon and swag.
